title: Complementary and Alternative Medicines and Multiple Sclerosis
description: Complementary and alternative medicines (CAM) for MS are treatments and therapies outside of conventional medical approaches to support well-being. Learn more.
cleaned_text: Need More Information? We Are Here Our MS Navigators help identify solutions and provide access to the resources you are looking for. Call 1-800-344-4867 or contact us online. Contact an MS Navigator Contact an MS Navigator
